history.proof: intros x. unfold canonical. split. - hauto lq: on depth: 3use: and_comm, canonical, and_assoc. - hauto lq: on depth: 3use: and_comm, canonical, and_assoc.

exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) x : poly A0 eqA ltM Unable to unify "((?M2202 /\\ ?M2203) /\\ ?M2204 -> ?M2202 /\\ ?M2203 /\\ ?M2204) /\\ (?M2202 /\\ ?M2203 /\\ ?M2204 -> (?M2202 /\\ ?M2203) /\\ ?M2204)" with "olist (A:=A) ltM (s2p A A0 eqA n ltM x) /\\ nZterm A0 eqA (n:=n) (s2p A A0 eqA n ltM x)".

In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) x : poly A0 eqA ltM Unable to unify "(?M2206 /\\ ?M2207 -> ?M2207 /\\ ?M2206) /\\ (?M2207 /\\ ?M2206 -> ?M2206 /\\ ?M2207)" with "Relation_Operators_compat.Desc (mon n) ltM (fP A n (s2p A A0 eqA n ltM x))".
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) x : poly A0 eqA ltM Unable to unify "((?M2206 /\\ ?M2207) /\\ ?M2208 -> ?M2206 /\\ ?M2207 /\\ ?M2208) /\\ (?M2206 /\\ ?M2207 /\\ ?M2208 -> (?M2206 /\\ ?M2207) /\\ ?M2208)" with "(fix F (l : list (Term A n)) : (fun _ : list (Term A n) => Prop) l := match l as l0 return ((fun _ : list (Term A n) => Prop) l0) with | nil => True | y :: l0 => (fun (a : Term A n) (_ : list (Term A n)) (Rec : Prop) => Rec /\\ ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a) y l0 (F l0) end) (s2p A A0 eqA n ltM x)".

In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) x : poly A0 eqA ltM Unable to unify "(?M2206 /\\ ?M2207 -> ?M2207 /\\ ?M2206) /\\ (?M2207 /\\ ?M2206 -> ?M2206 /\\ ?M2207)" with "(fix F (l : list (Term A n)) : (fun _ : list (Term A n) => Prop) l := match l as l0 return ((fun _ : list (Term A n) => Prop) l0) with | nil => True | y :: l0 => (fun (a : Term A n) (_ : list (Term A n)) (Rec : Prop) => Rec /\\ ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a) y l0 (F l0) end) (s2p A A0 eqA n ltM x)".

original: intros x. unfold canonical. intros Cs. unfold canonical in Cs. intros Cq. unfold canonical. unfold canonical in Cq. intros t. apply and_assoc. split. - apply and_comm. - apply and_assoc in Cs. apply and_comm in Cs. apply and_assoc in Cq. apply and_comm in Cq. apply and_assoc. apply and_comm.
